content: Our paper Meta-Speaker is accepted by ACM MobiCom 2023 (CCF-A)!
The journal version of MicNest is accepted by IEEE TMC (CCF-A)!
Our paper mmHawkeve is accepted by IEEE Secon 2023 (CCF-B)!
Our survey paper on mmWave-based human sensing is accepted by IEEE Communication Survey & Tutorial (JCR Q1)!
Our work MicNest won the Best Paper Runner-Up Award from ACM SenSys 2022 (Top 2 out of all 209 submissions)!
Our two works MicNest and AIM are accepted by ACM SenSys 2022 (CCF-B)!
